name: Pixxlized Questions
description:
A simple batch-file game made for the 32-MB Game Jam! Made in notepad.

How to play:

1. Run the game

2. Type "Play" on your keyboard and press enter

3. Type the correct answer´s number and press enter

Warning: The game uses a command called: PING localhost -n * >NUL in order to add waiting between messages! This will ping your network up to 6 times every time there needs to be waiting! It is not DDOS, nor dangerous for your network, however it is something to be noted!

PSST! Type "helpme" to get all correct answers!
